name: VNTrajectoryObservation
desc: An observation that describes a detected trajectory.

items.name: var detectedPoints: [VNPoint]
items.desc: The centroid points of the detected contour along the trajectory.

items.name: var projectedPoints: [VNPoint]
items.desc: The centroids of the calculated trajectory from the detected points.

items.name: var equationCoefficients: simd_float3
items.desc: The coefficients of the parabolic equation.

items.name: var movingAverageRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The moving average radius of the object the request is tracking.
